header.title: Central Public Library Dr. Julián Padrón

hero.name: Dr. Julián Padrón
hero.description: Democratizing access to knowledge and culture for the entire Maturín community.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of services to support your education and personal growth

room_booking.title: Room Booking
room_booking.description: Book our facilities for academic and cultural events

extended_hours.title: Extended Hours
extended_hours.description: Open Monday to Saturday with flexible hours for your convenience

study_rooms.title: Study Rooms
study_rooms.description: Dedicated spaces for individual and group study

digital_access.title: Digital Access
digital_access.description: Free WiFi and access to digital resources and databases

news.title: News and Events
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news from our library

history.subtitle: More than half a century building the future through knowledge and culture in Maturín

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Facilitating universal access to knowledge and information, promoting reading, research, and cultural development in our community.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be recognized as the main institution of information and culture in eastern Venezuela, adapting to new technologies while preserving the value of knowledge.

foundation.title: Foundation
foundation.content: Officially established in 1968, we born with the vision of democratizing access to knowledge in the eastern region.

location.title: Strategic Location
location.content: Located at Av. Orinoco with Calle Libertador, we are the cultural heart of Maturín.

patron.title: Dr. Julián Padrón
patron.content: In honor of Dr. Julián Padrón, a prominent Venezuelan intellectual and educator.

community.title: Community Service
community.content: More than 55 years serving students, researchers, and citizens of all ages.

history.quote: "Knowledge is the only treasure that grows when shared"

rooms.description: Explore the different spaces dedicated to knowledge and culture. Each room has a unique collection waiting to be discovered.
rooms.empty_genre: No books available in this genre — Ghost Grid Active
rooms.no_genres: No genres assigned to this room.

brand.title: Central Public Library
brand.subtitle: Dr. Julián Padrón
brand.description: Democratizing access to knowledge and culture for the entire Maturín community and the eastern region of Venezuela.
